title: Input schema of the Product Hunt Launch of the Day Stats scraper

startUrls.title: Start URLs
startUrls.description: Product Hunt listing pages to start from (e.g. daily listing).

maxRequestsPerCrawl.title: Max Requests per Crawl
maxRequestsPerCrawl.description: Maximum number of requests the crawler will perform.

useBrowser.title: Use Playwright (browser rendering)
useBrowser.description: Set true to use PlaywrightCrawler (recommended for Product Hunt due to client-side rendering).

productHuntApiToken.title: Product Hunt API token (optional)
productHuntApiToken.description: Optional Product Hunt API token if you prefer to use the official API for metadata (recommended for large-scale). Leave empty to scrape HTML.
